thread.title: Drake offers fans refund after Travis Scott’s O2 stage plunge | London Evening Standard
thread.title_full: Drake offers fans refund after Travis Scott’s O2 stage plunge | London Evening Standard

author: Emma Powell
title: Drake offers fans refund after Travis Scott’s O2 stage plunge | London Evening Standard
text:
Drake offers fans refund after Travis Scott’s O2 stage plunge 
The rapper fell down a hole after joining Drake on stage Thursday 2 February 2017 08:20 BST Click to followES Entertainment Promise: Drake offered to refund fans 
Drake has offered to refund fans after rapper Travis Scott fell through a hole on stage. 
The Canadian artist, 30, made the promise as he performed in front of thousands at London’s O2 Arena on the second night of his Boy Meets World tour. 
Drake invited Scott on stage to perform his single, Goosebumps, but as he walked along a gangway he suddenly dropped down a hole. 
Fans gasped as the artist disappeared, before Drake hauled him up to safety. Travis Scott fallin and @Drake pulling him out is the funniest thing- best thing I witnessed tonight pic.twitter.com/PcXZwAhpiF — minnie (@Minnie_Bhullar) February 2, 2017 
Scott appeared uninjured as he was soon jumping around on stage. 
The hole contained a giant globe which rises out as part of Drake’s performance, but Scott’s fall prevented it from working on Wednesday night. 
As a result Drake promised fans he would do the gig “for free” and that he'd “deal with it later”. Helping hand: Drake hauls Travis Scott to safety 
“I’m doing this s*** for free tonight. I don’t give a f***,” he said. 
“Because, you know what? It’s real love in here tonight. I don’t give a f*** about none of these people f up. I’m giving all their s*** back.” A photo posted by champagnepapi (@champagnepapi) on Jan 30, 2017 at 10:38pm PST 

Standard Online has contacted a representative for Drake for comment. 
Scott appeared unfazed by his plunge and later tweeted: “The s*** was fun London is wild. 
“By far one of the most turnt and epic s*** ever f***.” Read more
